item.title: The Addictiveness of Typeracer
item.description: For the uninitiated, typeracer.com is a website that allows you to test your typing speeds against other people using segments of text from different sources. Judging by the relatively copious number of races I’ve partaken in - I probably liked it: Who’s my opponent? A big factor in typeracer is your average WPM1. I came to the realization that my most challenging opponent was myself - I had to beat my own average score every race so I won’t lower it.
